trans-unit.source: Contains a variable number of arguments which are either XSLT parameters or extension objects.
trans-unit.target: 包含引數的變數，引數為 XSLT 參數或延伸物件 (Extension Object)。

trans-unit.source: This class is used by the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別由<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XslCompiledTransform.Transform%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: It allows parameters and extension objects to be invoked from within the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 它可讓參數和從樣式表中叫用的擴充物件。

trans-unit.source: When the parameters and objects are added to the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>, they are associated with a namespace qualified name and a namespace URI, respectively.
trans-unit.target: 當加入參數和物件至<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>，它們分別為命名空間限定的名稱和命名空間 URI 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The following are advantages to passing an object rather than using an embedded script such as `<msxsl:script>`:
trans-unit.target: 以下是傳遞給物件，而不是使用內嵌指令碼，例如優點`<msxsl:script>`:

trans-unit.source: Provides better encapsulation and reuse of classes.
trans-unit.target: 提供較佳的類別封裝和重複使用。

trans-unit.source: Allows style sheets to be smaller and more easily maintained.
trans-unit.target: 允許樣式表較小且容易維護。

trans-unit.source: Supports passing node fragments (through the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>) to the style sheet.
trans-unit.target: 將節點片段傳遞的支援 (透過<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>) 樣式表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>, see [XSLT Extension Objects](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md) and [XSLT Parameters](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList>，請參閱[XSLT 擴充物件](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-extension-objects.md)和[XSLT 參數](~/docs/standard/data/xml/xslt-parameters.md)。

trans-unit.source: Implements a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />.
trans-unit.target: 實作 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to associate with the object.
trans-unit.target: 與物件關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: To use the default namespace, specify an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用預設的命名空間，請指定空字串。

trans-unit.source: The object to add to the list.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至清單的物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a new object to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> and associates it with the namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 將新物件加入至 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />，並將其與命名空間 URI 相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The `params` keyword, which allows an unspecified number of parameters to be passed, is currently not supported.
trans-unit.target: `params`關鍵字，以允許未指定要傳遞的參數數目，目前不支援。

trans-unit.source: XSLT style sheets that utilize methods defined with the `params` keyword does not work correctly.
trans-unit.target: 利用定義與方法的 XSLT 樣式表`params`關鍵字無法正常運作。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[params](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/params.md)。

trans-unit.source: In the following example, the style sheet uses an XSLT extension object to convert the book price.
trans-unit.target: 在下列範例中，在樣式表會使用 XSLT 擴充物件轉換書籍價格。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following data files as input.
trans-unit.target: 這個範例會使用下列的資料檔案，做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> is either <see langword="null" /> or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或 http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> already has an extension object associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> 已經有與其相關的擴充物件。

trans-unit.source: The caller does not have sufficient permissions to call this method.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫端沒有足夠的使用權限呼叫這個方法。

trans-unit.source: The name to associate with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 與參數關聯的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to associate with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 與參數關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: To use the default namespace, specify an empty string.
trans-unit.target: 若要使用預設的命名空間，請指定空字串。

trans-unit.source: The parameter value or object to add to the list.
trans-unit.target: 要加入至清單的參數值或物件。

trans-unit.source: Adds a parameter to the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> and associates it with the namespace qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 將參數加入至 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />，並將其與命名空間限定名稱相關聯。

trans-unit.source: The `parameter` should correspond to a W3C type.
trans-unit.target: `parameter`應該對應至 W3C 型別。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the W3C types, either XPath or XSLT, and the corresponding.NET class.
trans-unit.target: 下表顯示 W3C 型別、 XPath 或 XSLT 和 corresponding.NET 類別。

trans-unit.source: W3C Type
trans-unit.target: W3C 型別

trans-unit.source: Equivalent.NET Class (Type)
trans-unit.target: Equivalent.NET 類別 （型別）

trans-unit.source: `String` (XPath)
trans-unit.target: `String` (XPath)

trans-unit.source: `Boolean` (XPath)
trans-unit.target: `Boolean` (XPath)

trans-unit.source: `Number` (XPath)
trans-unit.target: `Number` (XPath)

trans-unit.source: `Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)
trans-unit.target: `Result Tree Fragment` (XSLT)

trans-unit.source: `Node Set` (XPath)
trans-unit.target: `Node Set` (XPath)

trans-unit.source: `Node`* (XPath)
trans-unit.target: `Node`* (XPath)

trans-unit.source: *This is equivalent to a node set that contains a single node.
trans-unit.target: *這相當於含有單一節點的節點集。

trans-unit.source: If the parameter object being invoked from within the style sheet is not one of the above, it is converted according to the following rules:
trans-unit.target: 如果正在從樣式表內叫用的參數物件不是上述其中一項，則會根據下列規則進行轉換：

trans-unit.source: CLR numeric types are converted to <xref:System.Double>.
trans-unit.target: CLR 數字類型會轉換為 <xref:System.Double>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime> type is converted to <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime> 類型會轉換為 <xref:System.String>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> types are converted to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.IXPathNavigable> 類型會轉換為 <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。

trans-unit.source: `XPathNavigator[]` is converted to <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>.
trans-unit.target: `XPathNavigator[]` 轉換成<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeIterator>。

trans-unit.source: All other types throw an error.
trans-unit.target: 所有其他類型都會擲回錯誤。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList.AddParam%2A> method to create a parameter representing the current date and time.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例會使用<xref:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList.AddParam%2A>方法來建立參數，代表目前日期和時間。

trans-unit.source: The example uses the following two data files as input.
trans-unit.target: 此範例會使用下列兩個資料檔案做為輸入。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> is either <see langword="null" /> or http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> 為 <see langword="null" /> 或 http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="name" /> is not a valid name according to the W3C XML specification.
trans-unit.target: 根據 W3C XML 規格，<paramref name="name" /> 不是有效的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> already has a parameter associated with it.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="namespaceUri" /> 已經有與其相關的參數。

trans-unit.source: Removes all parameters and extension objects from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 移除所有的參數和擴充物件。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the object.
trans-unit.target: 物件的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the object associated with the given namespace.
trans-unit.target: 取得與指定命名空間關聯的物件。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI object or <see langword="null" /> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI 物件；如果沒有找到物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> does not check to ensure the name passed is a valid local name; however, the name cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 不會檢查傳遞的名稱是否為有效的本機名稱，但不能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the parameter.
trans-unit.target: 與參數關聯的命名空間 URI。

trans-unit.source: Gets the parameter associated with the namespace qualified name.
trans-unit.target: 取得與名命空間限定名稱關聯的參數。

trans-unit.source: The parameter object or <see langword="null" /> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 參數物件，如果沒有找到物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI associated with the object to remove.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI，與要移除的物件相關聯。

trans-unit.source: Removes the object with the namespace URI from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 移除有命名空間 URI 的物件。

trans-unit.source: The object with the namespace URI or <see langword="null" /> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 具有命名空間 URI 的物件；如果沒有找到物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the parameter to remove.
trans-unit.target: 要移除的參數名稱。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> does not check to ensure the name passed is a valid local name; however, the name cannot be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 不會檢查傳遞的名稱是否為有效的本機名稱，但不能為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the parameter to remove.
trans-unit.target: 命名空間 URI，屬於要移除的參數。

trans-unit.source: Removes the parameter from the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" />.
trans-unit.target: 從 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Xsl.XsltArgumentList" /> 移除參數。

trans-unit.source: The parameter object or <see langword="null" /> if one was not found.
trans-unit.target: 參數物件，如果沒有找到物件，則為 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: Occurs when a message is specified in the style sheet by the <c>xsl:message</c> element.
trans-unit.target: 發生於 <c>xsl:message</c> 元素在樣式表中指定訊息時。

trans-unit.source: If the event is not registered, all messages are piped to standard out.
trans-unit.target: 如果未註冊的事件，將所有訊息都傳送至標準輸出。
